description: A festival is approaching, and Ashford Academy is busily and peacefully -- or as peacefully as it gets, anyway -- preparing to it. However, terrorists attack and seize control of the school, interrupting the students` activities. Now Lelouch and his friends must thwart the terrorist attack.

titles.title: コードギアス 反逆のルルーシュ キセキの誕生日[バースデー]
